code: import api from"./api";import getTokenData from"./getTokenData";import TokenService from"./tokenService";var register=function register(username,email,password){return api.post("/auth/signup",{username:username,email:email,password:password});};var login=function login(username,password){return api.post("/auth/signin",{username:username,password:password}).then(function(response){if(response.data.accessToken){TokenService.setUser(response.data);}return response.data;});};var logout=function logout(){TokenService.removeUser();};var getCurrentUser=function getCurrentUser(){var clientSessionStorage=JSON.parse(sessionStorage.getItem("user"));return getTokenData(clientSessionStorage.accessToken);};var AuthService={register:register,login:login,logout:logout,getCurrentUser:getCurrentUser};export default AuthService;
